program.name: Lynn Lambert
program.title: Science Healthcare Career Camp - Summer STEM 2015
program.age: Rising High School Seniors and Graduates
program.location: Thomas Nelson Historic Triangle Campus - 4601 Opportunity Way, Williamsburg, VA 23188
program.description: Having you ever thought about a career in the medical field? This camp is for you! Discover high grouwth careers and visit a local Health Care Facility.

program.name: Lynn Lambert
program.title: Engineering & Advanced Manufacturing Career Camp - Summer STEM 2015
program.age: Rising High School Seniors and Graduates
program.location: Peninsula Workforce Development Center - 600 Burler Farm Road, Hampton, VA 23666
program.description: As manufacturing and engineering careers grow in Hampton Roads now is the best time to learn about exciting and high paying careers.

program.name: Lynn Lambert
program.title: Information Technology Career Camp -Summer STEM 2015
program.age: Rising High School Seniors and Graduates
program.location: Thomas Nelson Community College - Hamton III, 525 Butler Farm Road, Hampton, VA 23666
program.description: Technology is the key to the future. Cyber Security and Computer Technology could be in your future. Visit a local IT company on the forefront of technology. All Camps include lunch, field trips and campus tours.
